description: Comprehensive design system alignment across web and mobile platforms with luxury minimalist liquid animations

phases.name: Luxury Motion Foundation
phases.description: Design tokens and primitives for liquid display animations and Jony Ive-inspired minimalist motion

phases.name: Web Liquid Animations
phases.description: Sophisticated fluid animations and micro-interactions for web platform

phases.name: Mobile Liquid Animations
phases.description: Premium gesture-driven animations and physics-based interactions for mobile

phases.name: Premium Polish & Delight
phases.description: Cross-platform luxury refinements, ambient animations, and anticipatory motion

stories.title: Update Tailwind config to import design tokens
stories.description: Refactor tailwind.config.js to import colors, spacing, and typography directly from @nullspace/design-tokens instead of hardcoded values
acceptance: TITANIUM colors exactly match token values
No hardcoded color hex values remain
implementation: Add require/import for design-tokens at top of config
Replace titanium color object with TITANIUM import
Replace action color object with ACTION import
Keep glass colors as rgba (not in tokens)
Test build: cd website && pnpm build
stories.notes: Tailwind requires CommonJS, use require() syntax. Token package exports ESM but Tailwind can handle it.

stories.title: Add TYPE_SCALE typography to Tailwind
stories.description: Add all TYPE_SCALE variants (micro, label, body, bodyLarge, heading, headingLarge, display, hero) to Tailwind fontSize config
acceptance: All 8 TYPE_SCALE variants available as Tailwind classes
Each variant includes size, lineHeight, letterSpacing, and fontWeight
Classes work: text-micro, text-label, text-body, etc.
implementation: Map TYPE_SCALE to Tailwind fontSize format
stories.notes: Tailwind fontSize can include lineHeight, letterSpacing, fontWeight in options object

stories.title: Add SHADOW/ELEVATION to Tailwind boxShadow
stories.description: Add shadow tokens (sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl) and semantic elevation classes to Tailwind
acceptance: shadow-sm through shadow-2xl match token values
Semantic classes: shadow-card, shadow-dropdown, shadow-modal, shadow-overlay
GLOW effects available as ring utilities
implementation: Import SHADOW, ELEVATION, GLOW from design-tokens
Convert SHADOW objects to CSS box-shadow strings
Add glow ring utilities for focus states
stories.notes: Format: `${offsetX}px ${offsetY}px ${blur}px ${spread}px rgba(0,0,0,${opacity})`

stories.title: Add SPACING tokens to Tailwind
stories.description: Add semantic spacing (xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, 3xl) and RADIUS tokens
acceptance: Spacing classes: p-xs, m-sm, gap-md, etc.
Border radius: rounded-sm through rounded-full match tokens
implementation: Extend Tailwind spacing with semantic keys
stories.notes: Keep Tailwind default spacing (0-96) and ADD semantic keys

stories.title: Add CSS custom properties for design tokens
stories.description: Generate CSS custom properties from tokens for runtime access and dark mode support
acceptance: CSS variables for all TITANIUM shades
Dark mode .dark class inverts appropriate values
implementation: Add .dark block with inverted titanium values
stories.notes: Dark mode: titanium-50 becomes titanium-950, etc. Keep action colors same.

stories.title: Add SHADOW exports to mobile theme.ts
stories.description: Add React Native shadow styles derived from design tokens
acceptance: SHADOWS export with sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl variants
Each variant has shadowOffset, shadowRadius, shadowOpacity, shadowColor
implementation: Convert to React Native shadow format
Add iOS elevation property for Android compatibility
stories.notes: Android uses elevation prop, iOS uses shadow* props. Include both.

stories.title: Align mobile TYPOGRAPHY with TYPE_SCALE
stories.description: Update TYPOGRAPHY to use TYPE_SCALE values from design tokens
acceptance: All TYPE_SCALE variants available in TYPOGRAPHY
Font sizes match token values exactly
Line heights and letter spacing included
implementation: Map TYPE_SCALE to React Native format
Ensure font weights are strings ('400', '600', etc.)
stories.notes: React Native fontWeight must be string, tokens have numbers

stories.title: Update web Button components with token colors
stories.description: Update all button variants to use action colors and proper shadows
implementation: Search for hardcoded #5E5CE6 or similar in components
Replace with Tailwind action color classes
Add shadow and focus ring classes
stories.notes: Use grep to find all color usages first

stories.title: Update web Card components with elevation shadows
stories.description: Add proper elevation shadows to all card-like components
implementation: Add shadow-card class to base cards
stories.notes: Use Tailwind's transition-shadow for smooth hover effects

stories.title: Update web typography usage
stories.description: Replace inline font styles with TYPE_SCALE Tailwind classes
acceptance: Headlines use text-heading, text-headingLarge, or text-display
Body text uses text-body or text-bodyLarge
implementation: Create mapping from current to TYPE_SCALE
Search and replace font size classes
stories.notes: Start with high-impact screens: Lobby, Game screens

stories.title: Add spring animations to web interactions
stories.description: Add Framer Motion for spring physics animations
implementation: Update interactive components with motion variants
Test on low-power devices for performance
stories.notes: Import spring configs from design-tokens

stories.title: Update PrimaryButton with shadows and springs
stories.description: Enhance PrimaryButton with elevation shadows and spring press animation
implementation: Import SHADOWS and SPRING from theme
Add shadow styles to button container
stories.notes: Use useAnimatedStyle for shadow interpolation

stories.title: Add elevation to mobile card surfaces
stories.description: Add proper shadows to all card-like surfaces on mobile
acceptance: Shadows render on both iOS and Android
implementation: Add shadow styles to card components
stories.notes: Android elevation requires overflow visible on parent

stories.title: Align mobile text components with TYPE_SCALE
stories.description: Update all text styling to use TYPE_SCALE from TYPOGRAPHY
acceptance: Screen titles use TYPOGRAPHY.heading or headingLarge
Balance displays use TYPOGRAPHY.display with mono font
implementation: Test readability on various screen sizes
stories.notes: Spread TYPOGRAPHY objects into StyleSheet styles

stories.title: Implement full game color themes - Web
stories.description: Apply GAME color schemes to all casino game views
acceptance: Each game screen uses GAME[gameId].primary as background gradient base
Consistent game identity across all 10 games
implementation: Import GAME colors into game components
stories.notes: Use CSS gradient with primary color and slight overlay

stories.title: Implement full game color themes - Mobile
stories.description: Apply GAME color schemes to all mobile game screens
acceptance: Each game uses GAME[gameId].primary for background
implementation: Import GAME from theme or directly from tokens
stories.notes: Use LinearGradient from expo-linear-gradient

stories.title: Add game-specific animations
stories.description: Implement game-specific spring animations for core mechanics
acceptance: Card games use SPRING.cardDeal and cardFlip
implementation: Identify key animation moments per game
stories.notes: Start with Hi-Lo as simplest game to prototype

stories.title: WCAG AA contrast audit
stories.description: Verify all text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements
acceptance: Game table text readable on colored backgrounds
No contrast failures in automated testing
implementation: Run axe-core or similar on all screens
stories.notes: Audit complete. Created accessible color tokens and utility classes. Documented that titanium-400 should only be used for large text (18px+). Added --a11y-* CSS variables and .a11y-* utility classes.

stories.title: Implement prefers-reduced-motion
stories.description: Respect user preference for reduced motion
acceptance: Essential feedback animations still work (color changes)
No jarring movements for users with vestibular disorders
stories.notes: Some users get motion sickness from spring animations

stories.title: Dark mode full implementation
stories.description: Complete dark mode support with inverted titanium scale
acceptance: Dark mode toggle works on both platforms
Game backgrounds work in dark mode
No pure white or pure black (use titanium-50/950)
implementation: Web: Ensure .dark class toggles CSS variables
Mobile: Create dark theme variant of COLORS
Test all screens in both modes
stories.notes: Game backgrounds may need special dark variants

stories.title: Visual regression test setup
stories.description: Set up visual regression testing for design system changes
stories.notes: Web visual regression script complete. Captures: mode-select, lobby (desktop/mobile), blackjack, roulette, dark mode. Run npm run visual:capture to generate baselines, visual:compare to test. Mobile testing deferred to native team.

stories.title: Performance audit for animations
stories.description: Ensure animations maintain 60fps on target devices
acceptance: No animation jank on mid-range Android
iOS animations smooth at 120fps on ProMotion
Memory usage stable during extended play
stories.notes: Code audit complete. All animations use native drivers (mobile) and will-change optimizations (web). Reduced motion support in place. Manual device testing checklist provided in PERFORMANCE_AUDIT.md.

stories.title: Add blur scale tokens to design-tokens package
stories.description: Create dedicated blur token scale for glassmorphism and frosted glass effects
acceptance: BLUR scale exported: none (0), xs (4px), sm (8px), md (16px), lg (24px), xl (32px), 2xl (48px)
Semantic blur values: subtle, glass, heavy, frosted
stories.notes: Foundation for Apple Liquid Glass-inspired effects. Blur is GPU-accelerated via backdrop-filter.

stories.title: Add glassmorphism effect tokens
stories.description: Create combined glassmorphism configuration tokens for luxury frosted glass UI
acceptance: GLASS presets: subtle, medium, heavy, frosted
Each preset includes: blur, opacity, tint (rgba), border (rgba)
BACKDROP_FILTER presets for CSS backdrop-filter combos
Works with both light and dark titanium backgrounds
implementation: Define GLASS object with blur + opacity + tint + border
Define BACKDROP_FILTER combining blur + brightness + saturate
stories.notes: Jony Ive: 'Material honesty' - let glass be glass. Use subtle tinting, not heavy overlays.

stories.title: Add luxury easing curves to animation tokens
stories.description: Extend EASING with sophisticated curves for liquid motion and premium feel
acceptance: EASING_LUXURY curves: liquidSmooth, liquidElastic, elegantEntry, elegantExit
stories.notes: iOS 17 made spring animation default. These curves complement springs for CSS transitions.

stories.title: Add liquid spring presets to animation tokens
stories.description: Create spring configurations for organic liquid motion and fluid interactions
acceptance: SPRING_LIQUID presets: liquidFloat, liquidRipple, liquidMorph, liquidSettle, liquidWave
Each preset has mass, stiffness, damping values
stories.notes: Springs feel natural because they 'slowly and gradually come to rest' - no abrupt stopping.

stories.title: Add scale transform tokens
stories.description: Create scale values for consistent transform animations across platforms
acceptance: SCALE values: subtle (1.02), small (1.05), medium (1.1), large (1.15), dramatic (1.25)
SCALE_DOWN values for press states: subtle (0.98), small (0.95), medium (0.9)
Semantic scales: hover, press, focus, active
implementation: Add SCALE and SCALE_DOWN to animations.ts
Add SCALE_SEMANTIC mapping (hover -> subtle, press -> small, etc.)
Ensure values work for both CSS and RN transforms
stories.notes: Consistent scale values prevent 'busy' feel. Jony Ive: subtlety over spectacle.

stories.title: Add gradient configuration tokens
stories.description: Create gradient presets for luxury backgrounds and liquid visual effects
acceptance: GRADIENT_LINEAR presets with angle and color stops
implementation: Define gradient structure: { type, angle/shape, stops: [{color, position}] }
Create titaniumSheen for subtle metallic effect
stories.notes: Gradients should be subtle - enhance depth without competing for attention.

stories.title: Implement liquid ripple effect component - Web
stories.description: Create water-like ripple animation that expands from touch/click point
acceptance: Ripple originates from exact click coordinates
Works on buttons, cards, list items
implementation: Create useRipple hook capturing click position
Calculate ripple size from container bounds
stories.notes: Material Design popularized ripples. Ours should be softer, more water-like - slower fade, gentler edge.

stories.title: Add spring-based button press animations - Web
stories.description: Replace CSS active:scale with spring physics for all interactive buttons
acceptance: Scale down with spring overshoot on release
Shadow reduces on press, expands on release
implementation: Create AnimatedButton wrapping existing button logic
Use react-spring useSpring for scale + shadow
stories.notes: The bounce-back on release is what makes springs feel premium. Avoid abrupt stops.

stories.title: Implement sliding tab indicator - Web
stories.description: Add liquid morphing background pill that slides between tabs with spring physics
acceptance: Background pill slides to active tab position
Pill width morphs to match tab width
Smooth color transition on active state
implementation: Add animated indicator element behind tabs
Calculate target position from active tab ref
Use react-spring useSpring for x + width
Add subtle scale bounce on settle
stories.notes: Like iOS segment control. The indicator should feel like it's being pulled to the new position.

stories.title: Add toast enter/exit animations - Web
stories.description: Implement spring-based slide-in and slide-out for toast notifications
acceptance: Toast slides in from right with spring overshoot
Stacks with stagger delay (50ms between toasts)
Slide out with spring + fade on dismiss
Progress bar for auto-dismiss animates smoothly
implementation: Wrap toast items with react-spring animated.div
Implement touch gesture handler for swipe
stories.notes: Toasts should enter assertively but exit gracefully - faster exit than enter.

stories.title: Implement glassmorphism modal backdrop - Web
stories.description: Enhance modal backdrops with animated glassmorphism blur effect
acceptance: Backdrop blur animates from 0 to BLUR.md on open
Modal content has subtle glass border
Blur intensity tracks modal open progress
Works with reduced motion (falls back to opacity)
implementation: Add CSS custom property for blur value
stories.notes: Animated blur feels premium. Static blur feels static. The animation sells the effect.

stories.title: Add page transition with shared element morph - Web
stories.description: Implement FLIP-style page transitions with shared element morphing
acceptance: Direction-aware (slide left vs right based on nav)
implementation: Replace CSS keyframe with react-spring transitions
Add exit animation support via AnimatePresence
Implement direction detection from route history
Add stagger wrapper for child reveal
stories.notes: FLIP = First, Last, Invert, Play. Calculate element positions before/after, animate the diff.

stories.title: Implement animated number counter - Web
stories.description: Create count-up/down animation for balance and numeric displays
acceptance: Numbers animate from old to new value
Uses spring physics for smooth settle
implementation: Interpolate between old and new numeric values
Add optional delta badge that fades out
stories.notes: Slot machine digit effect. Numbers should 'roll' not 'jump'. Very satisfying when done right.

stories.title: Add scroll-triggered reveal animations - Web
stories.description: Implement intersection observer-based reveal animations for content
acceptance: Content fades + translates in when entering viewport
implementation: Add stagger prop accepting index for delay calc
Apply to lobby game cards, transaction lists
stories.notes: Reveals create sense of journey and discovery. Should feel natural, not performative.

stories.title: Add magnetic cursor effect for CTAs - Web
stories.description: Implement subtle magnetic pull effect where buttons move slightly toward cursor
acceptance: Button translates toward cursor when within threshold
Spring return to center on mouse leave
Only on desktop (no effect on touch)
Applied to FAB and primary CTAs
implementation: Create useMagneticCursor hook tracking mouse position
Calculate distance and angle from button center
stories.notes: Subtle magnetism creates sense of object having 'weight'. Don't overdo it - barely perceptible is best.

stories.title: Implement bottom nav indicator animation - Web
stories.description: Add animated indicator line that slides between nav items with spring physics
acceptance: Indicator line slides to active nav item
Icon scales up slightly on active (1.1x)
implementation: Calculate position from active nav item ref
Use react-spring for x position animation
Add subtle icon scale animation on active
stories.notes: Navigation should feel responsive and alive. The indicator 'follows' your selection.

stories.title: Add skeleton shimmer loading states - Web
stories.description: Create animated skeleton components with traveling shimmer highlight
acceptance: Respects reduced motion (static instead of shimmer)
Smooth transition to real content on load
implementation: Create base Skeleton with CSS gradient animation
Create GameSkeleton composites matching game layouts
Add fade-out transition when content loads
stories.notes: Skeletons signal 'content is coming'. The shimmer suggests active loading, not broken state.

stories.title: Implement swipe-to-dismiss modal gesture - Mobile
stories.description: Add vertical pan gesture for dismissing bottom sheets and modals
acceptance: Swipe down to dismiss with velocity tracking
Rubber-band effect when pulling beyond threshold
Background blur intensity follows drag progress
Snap back if not past dismiss threshold
implementation: Interpolate backdrop blur with drag progress
stories.notes: iOS standard pattern. The rubber-band physics at boundaries is what makes it feel native.

stories.title: Add parallax scroll to lobby game cards - Mobile
stories.description: Implement parallax depth effect where cards translate at different speeds during scroll
acceptance: Cards translate vertically at 0.5x scroll speed
Header compresses smoothly on scroll up
implementation: Calculate parallax offset per card based on index
Use interpolate for smooth depth mapping
stories.notes: Parallax creates sense of depth without 3D transforms. Subtle is key - too much causes nausea.

stories.title: Implement magnetic snap scrolling - Mobile
stories.description: Add spring-based snapping to game cards with momentum preservation
acceptance: Cards snap to center with spring physics
Momentum from flick preserved (fast flick = skip cards)
implementation: Calculate snap point from scroll offset
stories.notes: iOS scroll physics are the gold standard. Match their friction coefficients for natural feel.

stories.title: Add staggered card entrance animation - Mobile
stories.description: Implement choreographed entrance with cards fading in sequentially
acceptance: Cards enter with fade + translateY + scale
First card starts after header settles
implementation: Pass index to calculate entering delay
stories.notes: Choreographed reveals feel intentional and premium. Random simultaneous entrance feels chaotic.

stories.title: Implement chip toss physics - Mobile
stories.description: Add parabolic arc animation when placing chips with physics-based landing
acceptance: Chip follows arc trajectory to bet area
Slight scatter on landing near existing chips
Bounce and settle with spring physics
implementation: Calculate parabolic path from start to end position
Calculate landing offset based on existing chips
stories.notes: Chips should feel like they have weight. The arc and tumble sell the 'toss' gesture.

stories.title: Add card deal animation from deck - Mobile
stories.description: Implement cards flying from deck position with rotation during deal
acceptance: Card originates from top-right deck position
Flies in arc to final position
implementation: Calculate trajectory from origin to target
Use withSequence: translate + rotate, then flip
Integrate with existing Card flip logic
stories.notes: DealtCard component enhanced: rotation 45°→0°, sequential flip after landing, STAGGER exported from theme.

stories.title: Implement roulette wheel physics - Mobile
stories.description: Create physics-based wheel spin with realistic deceleration and ball bounce
acceptance: Haptic pulses as ball crosses slots
implementation: Calculate initial rotation from spin strength
Ball: damped harmonic motion for bounces
Interpolate ball position to wheel rotation
Trigger haptics based on rotation angle
stories.notes: New RouletteWheel component with European wheel layout, ball physics, slot segments, and haptic feedback.

stories.title: Add dice throw physics - Mobile
stories.description: Implement 3D dice tumble with realistic bounce and settle physics
acceptance: Dice rotate on all 3 axes during throw
Bounce on table with decreasing height
implementation: Calculate rotation to land on target face
Bounce: damped spring with floor collision
stories.notes: Created Dice3D component with pip-based face layout. React Native doesn't support true 3D CSS transforms (translateZ, preserve-3d), so implemented convincing 2.5D effect using rotation, scale, dynamic shadows, and bounce physics. Integrated into CrapsScreen (2 dice) and SicBoScreen (3 dice). Uses SPRING_LIQUID.liquidSettle for organic settling animation. Shake-to-roll deferred to separate story.

stories.title: Enhance celebration particle system - Mobile
stories.description: Add confetti variants and screen shake for jackpot wins
acceptance: Multiple particle shapes: squares, triangles, circles
Firework burst patterns for big wins
implementation: Add shape variants to particle generator
Add screen shake via transform on root view
Create animated multiplier badge with scale pop
stories.notes: Enhanced GoldParticles with circle/square/triangle/star shapes. Added ColorVariant (gold/multicolor/game). Firework burst creates 3 sequential waves. Created useScreenShake hook with amplitude decay. MultiplierBadge shows pop-in + glow pulse. CelebrationOverlay orchestrates all effects.

stories.title: Add ambient floating particles - Both
stories.description: Create subtle floating dust motes for depth and premium atmosphere
acceptance: Very subtle (barely visible) - ambient not distracting
implementation: Create particle array with random properties
Add slight X drift for organic movement
stories.notes: Created AmbientParticles for both platforms. Web uses CSS @keyframes ambientFloat with sinusoidal path. Mobile uses Reanimated withRepeat/withSequence. Both pause when backgrounded and respect reduced motion. 12 particles default, 0.1-0.25 opacity (barely visible), 8-15s cycle.

stories.title: Implement anticipatory button animations - Both
stories.description: Add hover/focus animations that anticipate press action
acceptance: Subtle glow pulse when idle and enabled
Prepares user for what press will do
implementation: Web: Add hover state with translateY(-2px)
stories.notes: Web: AnimatedButton enhanced with handleMouseEnter for hover lift (-2px), scale (1.01), and expanded shadow. Optional enableBreathing prop adds 8s idle pulse (1.0→1.02). Uses react-spring `to()` for multi-value interpolation. Mobile: PrimaryButton enhanced with optional enableBreathing prop. Idle animation uses withRepeat/withSequence with sinusoidal easing. Pauses when app backgrounded. All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion.

stories.title: Add connection state liquid transitions - Both
stories.description: Create smooth morphing transitions between connection states
acceptance: Error state has attention-grabbing but not alarming animation
implementation: Add icon crossfade with opacity springs
Create pulse ring for connecting state
Add brief success flash on reconnect
stories.notes: Web: Added animated status dot with color spring, icon crossfade transition, pulse ring during connecting, success flash overlay on reconnect, subtle shake on error. Mobile: Enhanced with interpolateColor for smooth color morphing, success flash animation, error shake sequence. Both respect reduced motion.

stories.title: Implement tutorial spotlight reveal - Both
stories.description: Create animated spotlight that reveals UI elements during onboarding
acceptance: Circular reveal expands from target element
Spotlight follows element if it moves
implementation: Create spotlight mask with animated clip-path/borderRadius
Add step indicator with spring transitions
stories.notes: Web: Created TutorialSpotlight with radial gradient mask, animated spotlight position via react-spring, gesture hint icons, step indicator dots, tooltip card with spring transitions. Mobile: Added GestureHint component with pulse/bounce animations, updated TutorialStep type. Both respect reduced motion.

stories.title: Add form input floating label animations - Both
stories.description: Implement animated floating labels that rise on focus
acceptance: Label animates from placeholder to floating position
Color transitions to accent on focus
implementation: Track focus state and value presence
Animate translateY, scale, and color together
Add focus ring animation below input
stories.notes: Web: Created FloatingInput component using react-spring with floating label animation (translateY + scale), color transitions via progress interpolation, animated focus ring, validation checkmark animation, shake-on-error imperative method. Mobile: PremiumInput already had full implementation (floating label, scale reduction, color transition, underline animation, validation checkmark, shake). Both respect reduced motion.

stories.title: Create layout animation system - Both
stories.description: Implement FLIP-based layout animations for list reordering and content changes
acceptance: Elements animate position when layout changes
Stagger delays for multiple moving elements
implementation: Apply inverse transform then animate to 0
stories.notes: Web: Created useLayoutAnimation (single element), useListLayoutAnimation (multiple elements), useEnterExitAnimation (mount/unmount) using react-spring. Uses translate3d for GPU acceleration. Mobile: Created useLayoutAnimation, useListItemAnimation, useEnterAnimation, useExitAnimation, useSharedElementTransition using Reanimated. Uses onLayout for position tracking and withSpring/withDelay for staggered animations. Both respect reduced motion.

stories.title: Add game result morph animations - Both
stories.description: Create morphing transition between game states (betting -> result)
acceptance: Betting UI morphs into result display
implementation: Add color interpolation for state change
stories.notes: Web: Created ResultDisplay using react-spring with staged reveals (outcome→payout→breakdown→session), CountUp for payout animation, glassmorphism backdrop blur, glow pulse for wins, keyboard dismiss support. Mobile: ResultReveal already comprehensive with staged RevealElement animations, AnimatedPayout counter, GlowPulse for wins, color-coded outcomes. Both use spring physics and respect reduced motion.

stories.title: Implement idle state breathing animations - Both
stories.description: Add subtle breathing animation to key CTAs when idle
acceptance: CTA buttons have subtle scale pulse (1.0 to 1.02)
Only when user hasn't interacted recently
stories.notes: Web: Added breathing animation to GameControlBar FAB button with react-spring. Tracks idle state via timer (5s timeout), stops on hover/focus, uses 8s cycle (4s up + 4s down), scale 1.0→1.02. Mobile: PrimaryButton already had full breathing implementation via enableBreathing prop from DS-050 (withRepeat/withSequence, 8s cycle, stops on press, pauses when backgrounded). Both respect prefers-reduced-motion.

testingStrategy.manual: Cross-device testing on iOS, Android, Chrome, Safari

successMetrics.tokenCoverage: 100% of colors, spacing, typography from tokens
successMetrics.visualParity: Web and mobile screens visually identical
successMetrics.liquidMotion: All primary interactions use spring physics
successMetrics.glassmorphism: Modal and overlay surfaces use glass effects
successMetrics.microInteractions: All buttons, nav, and forms have micro-animations
successMetrics.anticipation: CTAs signal interactivity before user action

jonyIve.minimalism: Less, but better - reduce to essential elements
jonyIve.materialHonesty: Digital materials are themselves, not imitations
jonyIve.care: Every detail matters, from unwrap to interaction

liquidMotion.springs: Use spring physics over linear/eased timing
liquidMotion.settle: Animations gradually come to rest, never stop abruptly

luxuryPatterns.depth: Layered shadows and parallax create dimension
luxuryPatterns.celebration: Win magnitude matched to celebration intensity
